entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as looking disconcerted and then making a joke about finding his friend crying over his mother's old bloomers. ("I’ll look for him later, I expe ct I’ll find him upstairs crying his eyes out over my mother’s old bloomers or something.")

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as laughing along with George and Ron. ("Fred, George, and Ron laughed;")

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as laughing along with Fred and Ron. ("Fred, George, and Ron laughed;")

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as laughing along with Fred and George. ("Fred, George, and Ron laughed;")

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as looking reproachful when the others laugh at Sirius' joke. ("Hermione, however, looked reproachful.")

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr Weasley is mentioned as someone who will be visited by Harry and Hermione. ("the Weasleys and Harry and Hermione were planning to pa y Mr. Weasley another visit,")

entities.name: mad-eye
entities.description: Mad-Eye is mentioned as one of the people who will escort Mr Weasley on a visit. ("escorted by Mad-Eye and Lupin")

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is mentioned as one of the people who will escort Mr Weasley on a visit. ("escorted by Mad-Eye and Lupin")

entities.name: mundungus
entities.description: Mundungus is mentioned as someone who turns up in time for Christmas pudding and trifle. ("Mu ndungus turned up in time for Christmas pudding and trifle,")

relationships.description: Sirius makes a joke that Fred, George, and Ron laugh at. ("Fred, George, and Ron laughed;")
Hermione looks reproachful when the others laugh at Sirius' joke. ("Hermione, however, looked reproachful.")
Mad-Eye will escort Mr Weasley on a visit. ("escorted by Mad-Eye and Lupin")
Lupin will escort Mr Weasley on a visit. ("escorted by Mad-Eye and Lupin")
Mundungus turns up in time for Christmas pudding and trifle. ("Mu ndungus turned up in time for Christmas pudding and trifle,")
